nhc_headline: ...BERYL FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN TO A HURRICANE AGAIN BEFORE  LANDFALL... ...STORM SURGE WARNING EXTENDED EASTWARD ALONG THE TEXAS COAST...
summary:
...BERYL FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN TO A HURRICANE AGAIN BEFORE  LANDFALL... ...STORM SURGE WARNING EXTENDED EASTWARD ALONG THE TEXAS COAST...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Sat Jul 6
 the center of Beryl was located near 24.4, -93.7
 with movement NW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 997 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
